name: Leftovers
description: A held item that gradually restores the holder's HP in battle.
effect: Restores 1/16 of max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Choice Band
description: A held item that boosts the holder's power but only allows the use of one move.
effect: Increases Attack by 50% but restricts to one move.

name: Choice Scarf
description: A held item that boosts the holder's speed but only allows the use of one move.
effect: Increases Speed by 50% but restricts to one move.
